title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Michael Irvin on Dak's "Slump", Cowboys' Playoff Expectations, NIL Dangers
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Michael Irvin on Dak's "Slump", Cowboys' Playoff Expectations, NIL Dangers
description:
Colin discusses the beef between Aaron Rodgers and a Chicago sportswriter (3:00), why he's having trouble believing the latest twist in the Antonio Brown saga (7:00), and the blowback over Kirk Herbstreit's controversial comments about college players skipping bowl games (9:00), and the misconception about the journalistic integrity of league run sports networks (12:00) . Then, NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin joins Colin to discuss whether Dak has proven he'll never be an elite QB (14:00), why he doesn't like people saying Dak was in a "slump" (22:00), the team the Cowboys should be scared to face (24:00), the first time Michael met Micah Parsons (27:00), why Cooper Kupp is unlike other receivers (30:00), the side of the transfer portal nobody talks about (35:00), smart advice for college players on handling the new NIL rules (38:00), and why Michael is paying Aaron Rodgers and Davante Adams the ultimate compliment (42:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
